text:
Corporation for Public Broadcasting
555 Madison Avenue
New York, N. Y. 10022
(212) 582-2020
June 16, 1969
Mr. Robert Mott
Executive Director
National Educational Radio
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N.W.
Washington, D.C. 20036
Dear Bob:
Thanks so much for the warm hello! The telegram
is very much appreciated.
And I look forward to Thursday and the real beginning
of the beginning.
Director of Radio Projects
AH :ke
